listOfQuestions.question: Which movie features a character named Neo who discovers that the world he lives in is a simulated reality?
In the film 'Back to the Future', what is the name of the time-traveling DeLorean's inventor?
Which sci-fi film features a group of astronauts who journey to a mysterious monolith on the moon?
Who directed the science fiction film 'E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial'?
Which movie features a team of scientists who shrink down to microscopic size and enter a colleague's body in a miniature submarine?
Which science fiction film stars Arnold Schwarzenegger as a cyborg assassin sent back in time to kill Sarah Connor?
In the movie 'Minority Report', what technology is used to prevent crimes before they happen?
Which classic sci-fi film features a groundbreaking soundtrack by electronic music pioneers Wendy Carlos and Rachel Elkind?
What is the name of the fictional artificial intelligence system in '2001: A Space Odyssey'?
Which movie stars Tom Cruise as a police officer in a futuristic society where crimes are predicted and stopped before they occur?
What is the name of the giant city-ship in the movie 'Waterworld'?
In the film 'ET: The Extra-Terrestrial', what kind of candy does Elliott use to lure ET into his house?
Which sci-fi movie features a group of survivors trying to escape from underground caves filled with blind creatures that hunt by sound?
Which science fiction film follows a linguist who communicates with extraterrestrial visitors in an attempt to prevent global conflict?
In the movie 'The Fifth Element', what is the name of the ultimate weapon that can save the world?
Which sci-fi film features a post-apocalyptic world where robots are hunting the last remaining humans?
What is the name of the virtual reality universe in the movie 'Ready Player One'?
Which classic sci-fi film features a team of scientists who are miniaturized and injected into a dying scientist's bloodstream?
In the movie 'Blade Runner', what type of beings are hunted down and terminated by the protagonist?
Which sci-fi film stars Will Smith as a detective in a futuristic world where humans coexist with robots?
